parameters.value: Holdzone is intended to be just a place to send units where no interaction with them can occur. IE Upper right map corner
Escape pod harbor is the place where an escape pod starts when you buy the item from the vendor
NewUnitRegister is called so that units can have a unique AN number. Always register a unit that was created in the same trigger, or that is at map init.
So pirates can see all of space
Neutral Extra is the alien replacement.
Makes planet start at random position in its circular orbit.
Sets up original player name and makes sure all players are allied.
Preserve original names so that names can revert at game end.
Make sure everyone is allied to everyone else.
Create starting personnel, set it at playerhero.
Playerhero always points to the 'main' unit of the player, usually a personnel or alien/mutant.
SelectorGroup refers to the group of all playerhero icons.
News strings... moved here to stop repeats..
The U.S.I. Ordinator has reached an accord with the outlying provinces today, promising technical aid and supplies in exchange for influence in the rogue government.
A new synthetic compound developed by DIZ Photonics has been commissioned by the military in a possible use as an agent to repair cracked or worn metal.
An uprising in Kyanda leaves 400,000 dead and 28 million homeless as U.S.I. leaders struggle to contain and appease the rebels.

Scientists predict that new terraforming techniques could be used to revitalize planets destroyed by nuclear warfare. But should we be giving them a second chance? Send your opinion to wavelength 19215.212!

A new survey suggests that 35% of all males have suffered Zibin's Disease and that the 'harmless' epidemic continues to spread. The disease has no symptoms but government officials are placing 'dangerous' sectors under quarantine.

Sector 198X2, a small cluster of research stations on the outer fringes of civilization, is planning to announce a breakthrough in an undisclosed field. Industry analysts expect the announcement to be of a military nature.
A housewife shares her experience in savagely murdering rebel sympathizers tonight on wavelength 18920.221.
The economy has taken a 20% upturn in the past year, but can this trend last? Our senior economist explains everything at 8:00 standard time.
An error has occurred with your transmission service. Please check you have tuned in to the correct wavelength and reset your quantum transmitter.

A lost Coalition frigate from the Wars of Division has reappeared near an outpost in Byat sector yesterday. Confused crewmen were informed that their FTL time containment drives had failed, and that 34 years had passed since they began the jump.
Researchers on Earth have discovered that dinosaurs never actually existed. Details at 9:00 standard.
Citizens should be reminded that Deliciousâ„¢ Confectionary Food Bars are a healthy and sensually pleasing way to replenish lost nutrients, and are encouraged to requisition some ASAP.
Stop, before you damage company property!
You are probably in violation of several regulations!
If you do not put your weapons down, I will kill you to keep the peace.
My name is PACIFICATION BOT, and I am here to help you learn about the power of nonviolence!
I will be confiscating all the weapons you have!
True men use space-pickaxes, suit-wearing cur!
I have at least thirty hours left of charge! Plenty of time to stop evildoers such as you.
